author: Sarah D.
title: ‚ÄòThis one hurts‚Äô: Beloved, iconic actress Mary Tyler Moore has passed away
text:
‚Äî Kilgore Trout (@Beer__Wolf) January 25, 2017 
2017 may be shaping up to be just as cruel as 2016. Mary Tyler Moore has passed away: #BREAKING Mary Tyler Moore Dead at 80 https://t.co/tl35guKydG 
More from TMZ : 
MTM‚Äôs longtime rep, Mara Buxbaum , issued a statement to TMZ saying, ‚ÄúToday, beloved icon, Mary Tyler Moore, passed away at the age of 80 in the company of friends and her loving husband of over 33 years, Dr. S. Robert Levine.‚Äù 
‚ÄúA groundbreaking actress, producer, and passionate advocate for the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation, Mary will be remembered as a fearless visionary who turned the world on with her smile.‚Äù 
We‚Äôre told Mary had been on a respirator for more than a week. 
The world is a little less spunky today. May she rest in peace. She was great!!! RIP wonderful, pioneering MaryTyler Moore pic.twitter.com/alEni2mHUE 
‚Äî Mia Farrow (@MiaFarrow) January 25, 2017 My heart is broken. You were my idol and a role model and funny to the core of your beuatiful being. #RIPMaryTylerMoore 
‚Äî Caroline Rhea (@CarolineRhea) January 25, 2017 I love you, Mary Richards and I love you #MaryTylerMoore . Thanks for your help in bringing me up. Rest In Peace. 
‚Äî Judy Gold (@JewdyGold) January 25, 2017 I think Mary Tyler Moore was my first TV crush. Rest in peace. https://t.co/3z5NePzgVD 
‚Äî John Hayward (@Doc_0) January 25, 2017 RIP #MaryTylerMoore , who through her character was a role model for working women & proved that it's really brunettes who have more fun. üíÅüèª 
‚Äî Sarah Rumpf (@rumpfshaker) January 25, 2017 @rumpfshaker MTM helped prove you could be pro-woman without being a shrill joyless feminist. #RIP 
‚Äî Steven Lanzi (@qdpsteve) January 25, 2017 She could turn the world on with her smile. #RIP #MaryTylerMoore 
‚Äî Leslie Mac (@LeslieMac) January 25, 2017 Everybody either wanted her as wife, a mom, a grandma or a friend. The dictionary illustration of a million dollar smile. pic.twitter.com/QCv6te7z9c 
‚Äî David Burge (@iowahawkblog) January 25, 2017 "you've got spunk‚Ä¶.I HATE spunk" 
one of the best sitcom scenes ever https://t.co/c2kvn32qGb 
‚Äî Jake Tapper (@jaketapper) January 25, 2017 For years they've been looking for the next Mary Tyler Moore,relatable,loveable, but hilarious. Never found one. RIP https://t.co/YYA6dPKRFT
